Get In Touch

Have a question or want to connect? Here's how to reach Dr Adrian Laurence. Remember: no clinical advice is provided via email.

Important Safety Notice

No clinical advice via email. I cannot and will not provide personalized medical advice through email or this website.

For emergencies in New Zealand, dial 111.

For specific medical concerns, please consult your own GP or appropriate healthcare provider.

Contact Options

Email

For speaking engagements, media inquiries, or general questions about lifestyle medicine education.

Emergency Information

If You Need Immediate Medical Help

Emergency Services

Dial 111 for ambulance, fire, or police

Available 24/7 throughout New Zealand

Healthline

0800 611 116 for health advice

Available 24/7 for health concerns
